title: Champion Spotlight: Braum, the Heart of the Freljord

replies.body: Move aside MF and Morgana, we have a new best chest in the game.
I laughed so hard at this I had to log in and upvote!

So what happens when Braum{{champion:201}}  fights 
Volibear{{champion:106}} ?
Both sides pause and watch.
i logged in to upvote this
Logged in to downvote this
I was just logged in.

I upped in to log vote this.
Wait....
Does this mean he comes out tomorrow? <3 {{champion:201}}
braum or we riot!
The store is gonna have some downtime tomorrow, so yes
Bear once fight Braum. Braum now has new coat.
I'm thinking a new skin for him with a blatantly volibear coat
@Zileas would be most pleased.{{champion:1}}
Braum is too kind hearted to skin a bear. He'd probably win the wrestle, then get out the goat's milk to share with Voli
{{champion:201}}  HEY {{champion:106}} WE MUST WRASSLE!

Anyone else notice in the video they said "You'll have a heavy front line specialist ready to defends against any amount of aggression, or unexpeted bear wrestling" >_> tis op rito... tis op indeed.. {{champion:201}}  must have special speech when he see's {{champion:106}}  . Something along the lines of what {{champion:29}} says when he steps on a {{champion:51}} trap >_>

Rito.. we love you now more than ever.. expecially us AD Carry's, who are tired of having bad supports,

{{champion:222}} "Why you no body block cait ult?! >:O"
 {{champion:16}} ">_> i was supposed to?"

{{champion:22}} "Good teamwork, i thought u were across the lane!"
{{champion:201}} **strokes mustache** "I'm always there for you my sweet carry"

No you have it all wrong, us support players are happy that a support comes out because we hardly ever get love since the support item changes.  Also you adc mains should be greatful because the support role is devoted for adc's.  Also suppport mains like me get tired of cocky adc's alot faster then adc's get tired of bad supports...
{{champion:106}} lol ok
Im exciteddddd. Saved up 7800 IP for him.  He reminds me of Tusk from DoTA2 sooo much and Tusk is so badass
why waste 7800 when you can wait a week and get him for 6300
Why wait a week and get him for 6300 when you can get him NOW for 7800?
because only real men dont care about spending more ip to play THE MOST MANLY OF ALL MEN the day he comes out
And women >=T I got over 10k saved up
WOMEN CAN BE REAL MEN TOO
No longer shall man mode champs be necessary. This is the only man you need in league. {{champion:201}}
{{champion:80}} + {{champion:201}} = Game over.

**GUYS, RITO'S ANTI-SPAM SYSTEM WILL KEEP REMOVING MY ICON PIXEL ART POST, PLEASE CLICK ON THE LINK BELOW TO LOOK AT A SCREENSHOT OF MY ICON PIXEL ART OF BRAUM!!!**

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=47054551#post47054551

RIOT, PLEASE DON'T DELETE THIS!! THIS ISN'T SPAM!!!

THIS IS MY HARD WORK FOR MY LOVE OF THE RELEASE OF AN AWESOME CHAMPION!!!! D:

DAMN IT!!!

They deleted it again... >:/
what was it?
it was glorious
Im still waiting for Helmet Bro....{{summoner:3}} {{summoner:7}}
Did anyone else notice that some of the summoner names are names of mustaches?  I noticed Handlebar, Curly Q, and Pencil.  Well played Rito. A+! {{champion:201}}
The term, "Man Handling" shall now be taken to a new level.

This spotlight almost turned me gay.

And I am not alarmed by this.
Awesome quote , no homo

Actually, a good skin for Braum could be "good father" Braum
Dresses in button up t shirt, jeans, tennis shoes, and has a normal wooden door as a shield, or a lawnmower
His glacial fissure could be a trail of leaves he raked the other day
And his Q could be dirty laundry or something funny along those lines that a father would throw at someone else

Woodcutter/Carpenter Braum.
Complete with flannel shirt, overalls, and Oaken door shield
Braum should get a special trinket in howling abyss where he gets a new poro biscut every time he dies
Better idea, Braum has manly snax which when fed give the poro a moustache
I thought if he gave a poro snax to a poro they'd get a mustache. :T {{item:2052}}
"Captain Braum" featuring Braum with a car door for a shield would be sick, no? Captain America reference, yes?
FINALLY a champ for me. My KDA will stay the same, but my deaths will MEAN something.

8:10 "...Potential to shield allies from tons of damage"
So I'm assuming this is a hard counter to Bjergsen XD
Phreak must be very against this champion:  {{champion:201}}

Just broke off my front door {{champion:201}} 
I am quite excite {{champion:222}}
Does he look a little pink to anybody else?  I think braum got a little frostbitten. Riot give the man a fur coat!
